POSTED AT 8:41 AM EDT Tuesday, September 17 Corporate News By RICHARD BLOOM Globe and Mail Update
• Investment bank UBS Warburg on Tuesday lowered its 2003 and 2004 earnings forecast on Oracle Corp., the world's second-biggest software company, according to sources Tuesday morning. The sources told Reuters that UBS speculated first-quarter results, expected after the close on Tuesday, would be in line with consensus estimates but said management may give more cautious guidance.
Investment bank UBS가 2003,2004년의 Oracle Corp 예상수익을 낯추었답니다. (이 정보의)출처는 Reuters에 UBS가 화요일 폐장후 기대되는 (Oracle의) 1사분기 실적은 기대치에 부합할 것으로 추측하나 (수익해석에 있어) 경영진이 좀 더 조심스러운 해석을 내 놓게 될 것이라고 전하였습니다.
Speculate라는 단어의 근본의미는 추측(guess)이나 상당한 고민끝에 나온 추측(speculate)입니다. 그러나 영영사전에서 풀이한 것 처럼 사실에 근거한 단언/확언과는 거리가 멉니다. 깊이 생각한 끝에 어떤 사람은 억측을 펼 수도 있겠지요. Guess가 구어적 표현이라면 Speculate는 좀 더 격식을 차린 문어적 추측이겠습니다.
야후사전... spec·u·late － v.i. (-lat·ed, -lat·ing)
1 [Ⅰ([부])] [Ⅱthat[절] / wh-[절] / wh- to do] ⑴ (…에 대하여) 심사 숙고하다, 사색하다(meditate)<about, on, upon, as to ‥>. ㆍ ∼ about the meaning of life 인생의 의의에 대해서 골똘히 생각하다.
⑵ (…이라고) 추측[억측]하다<about, on, as to ‥>. ㆍ ∼ on where the satellite will fall 인공 위성의 낙하 지점을 추측하다. ㆍ We ∼d that the two might be engineers. 그 두 사람은 기술자일 것이라고 추측했다.
2 [Ⅰ([부])] (주식·토지 등에) 투기하다<in ‥>, (…을) 시세를 예측하고 사다[팔다]<on ‥>. ㆍ ∼ in real estate 부동산에 손을 대다. ㆍ ∼ on the devaluation of the dollar 달러의 평가 절하를 예측하고 투기를 하다.
[어원] ☞ 라틴어 speculatus에서. (specere 보다 ＋ -atus ＝관찰되다 → 숙고하다). ▷ SPECIES, SPECTER, SPECIMEN
Cambridge Dictionary... speculate (GUESS) verb to form opinions about something without having the necessary information or facts; to make guesses I don't really know what happened - I'm just speculating. [I] So far, the police can only speculate on the possible motives for the killing. [I] A spokesperson declined to speculate on the cause of the train crash. [I] Journalists are speculating about whether interest rates will be cut. [I] I wouldn't like to speculate how much that car must have cost him. [+ wh- word] It would be wrong to speculate why she resigned. [+ wh- word] It has been speculated that dinosaurs became extinct because the Earth's climate changed. [+ that clause]
m-w dictionary... 1 : to take to be true on the basis of insufficient evidence : THEORIZE <speculated that a virus caused the disease> 2 : to be curious or doubtful about : WONDER <speculates whether it will rain all vacation>
post.title: speculate
